xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1034179-Adam in Fragments 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9ZUyNkk3cW465lR9BpGTBuQH4uR.jpg After a prolonged disappearance, Adam (Beau Swartz) reluctantly returns to sex work. Following the urge to protect a young aspiring adult film star, Lucy (Keiva Bradley), from their terrorizing handler, Felix (Francisco Antonio), Adam’s actions trigger a series of events that send violent ripples through Los Angeles underground sex-trade. Featuring supporting performances from Jonathan Miller, Ryan Ruffing, Joe Garcia and Tara Emerson. This provocative, gritty drama is a true hustler’s odyssey. Adam in Fragments
